properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM NOTICE

SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE FROM ( SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, ROWNUM AS RN FROM ( SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE FROM NOTICE ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC ) ) WHERE RN BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_NO = ?
